body_html: Sorry, ignore what I wrote above. Seems like 1. is partly still there after all. As a user creating a team for the first time, it's still possible to change the preselected “Student” to “Coach” and add yourself to a team as a coach instead of a student. 😞

body: Sorry, ignore what I wrote above. Seems like 1. is partly still there after all. As a user creating a team for the first time, it's still possible to change the preselected “Student” to “Coach” and add yourself to a team as a coach instead of a student. 😞
